tool_description: Scans social media platforms to identify trending topics, hashtags, and emerging discussions within specified timeframes and geographic regions.

platform.description: Target social media platform (instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube)

category.description: Content category filter (lifestyle, tech, entertainment, business, health, fashion)

error_messages: Unsupported platform: Use one of [instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube].
Invalid category: Use one of [lifestyle, tech, entertainment, business, health, fashion, all].
Region not available: Specified region data is not accessible.
usage: Specify platform and timeframe, optionally set region and category filters. Returns trending topics with engagement metrics and growth indicators.

trending_topics.description: List of trending topic keywords and phrases

trending_hashtags.description: List of trending hashtags with # symbols

engagement_scores.description: Engagement scores corresponding to trending topics

growth_rate.description: Growth rate percentages for each trend
